tests.name: c-diamond
tests.test_code: (is (= (diamond \C) ["  A  " " B B " "C   C" " B B " "  A  "]))

tests.name: d-diamond
tests.test_code: (is (= (diamond \D) ["   A   " "  B B  " " C   C " "D     D" " C   C " "  B B  " "   A   "]))

tests.name: full-z-diamond
